name: Pacbase: Avoid Online Programs with a low comment/code ratio
description: Online Programs should have at least a ratio comment / code >= 33%. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
output: This report lists all Pacbase Online Program with comment/code ratio lower than X % It provides the following information: Online full name, comment/code ratio
rationale: Online Programs should have at least a ratio comment / code >= 5 %. The threshold is a parameter and can be changed at will.
remediation: Enrich Online Program code with comments.
